msbt.message: Here you go, .<10_4 /> Your very own tent!

Once you find the perfect spot, press  to access your inventory. Then select your tent to place it. Don't worry—you'll get a chance to see what it looks like before making your final decision. And you'll want a little breathing room, so take your time finding a space that works for you. Oh! I suppose I should probably set you up with a map too
Once you've put up your tent, please find your way back here. Use your new map if you need it! Well, off you go! I hope you find a great spot!
Once you've put up your tent, please come back and let us know!
You can place your tent among the trees or maybe near the beach— wherever you like, as long as it fits.
Wondering how much space your tent is going to take up?Try to imagine five folks standing side by side. That's how wide it is. Oh! And about three folks deep.
Leave the setup to us!<10_4 /> We'll be counting on you to get the supplies.
Please check with our boss, Tom Nook, about what supplies we'll need.
Any tree branches you find on the ground or shake out of the trees will work just fine for the campfire.
I'd appreciate it if you'd hold onto any weeds you pull up while you're gathering branches. In the near future, we'll want to buy them from you.
After you've gathered up 10 tree branches, please talk to our boss, Mr. Nook.
The key to getting to drop is standing in front of tree full of fruit. Then shake it with !
Once you find enough for the group, we'll make some yummy juice for everyone!
When you've found enough for everyone, please talk to Mr. Nook!
You handled your tasks perfectly. We got a nice campfire going!
What a great name! Just rolls off the tongue.<10_4 /> Thank you for offering such a wonderful idea to the group.

We're here to act as your support staff, but we've never lived on an uninhabited island before either. I'm not sure how helpful we'll be in this unfamiliar place, butwe'll rely on each other as fellow residents!

We'll let this campfire burn for the rest of the night. Feel free to rest in your tent if you start to feel tired. Ah, before you do that, though, there is something we need to give you. Please talk to Mr. Nook about it!
, will you be heading back to your tent soon?You've had quite the long day!<10_4 /> After you wake up tomorrow, please stop by Resident Services. Ah, Resident Services is this tent right near me!
, I'm sure today has worn you out. Why don't you go get some well-deserved rest?
